title: Markup of 6 Bills, Subcommittee on Health
Modernizing Hydropower: Licensing and Reforms for a Clean Energy Future
McMorris Rodgers, Wicker Raise Concern Over Secretary Raimondo’s Statement on BEAD Program
description: Washington, D.C. – House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) and U.S. Senator Roger Wicker (R-MS), ranking member of the Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation, today sent a letter to Department of Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo regarding her concerning statement that areas already committed to receive federal broadband funding could be eligible for additional funds during yesterday’s Senate Appropriations Committee hearing.

title: House Republicans Demand Answers from Biden Administration on Baby Formula Crisis

title: E&C Republican Leaders Ask Big Tech How They Will Handle Biden’s ‘Ministry of Truth’ Attempts to Censor Americans
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA), Communications and Technology Subcommittee Republican Leader Bob Latta (R-OH), and Consumer Protection and Commerce Subcommittee Republican Leader Gus Bilirakis (R-FL) asked Big Tech companies how they will handle the Biden administration’s latest efforts to censor Americans using the newly established Disinformation Governance Board.

title: Leader Rodgers Statement on Biden Administration Blocking American Energy Again With Cancelation of American Oil Leases
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) released the following statement on the Biden administration canceling oil leases in Alaska and the Gulf of Mexico.

title: Energy Subcommittee Leader Upton Opening Remarks on Hydropower Licensing and Regulations
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy Subcommittee Republican Leader Fred Upton (R-MI) delivered opening remarks at today’s Energy Subcommittee hearing on hydropower.

title: Leader Rodgers Calls for Hydropower to Be Properly Utilized
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks in today’s Energy Subcommittee hearing on hydropower.

title: Guthrie Opening Statement on Health Subcommittee Markup of Mental Health and Medical Innovation Solutions
description: Washington, D.C. — Energy and Commerce Health Subcommittee Republican Leader Brett Guthrie (R-KY) delivered remarks at today’s Health Subcommittee markup of six bills, including the H.R. 7667, the “Food and Drug Amendments of 2022, and H.R. 7666, the “Restoring Hope for Mental Health and Well-Being Act of 2022.”

title: Leader Rodgers Opening Statement on Health Subcommittee Markup of Mental Health and Medical Innovation Solutions
description: Washington, D.C. — House Energy and Commerce Committee Republican Leader Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-WA) delivered remarks at today’s Health Subcommittee markup of six bills, including the H.R. 7667, the “Food and Drug Amendments of 2022, and H.R. 7666, the “Restoring Hope for Mental Health and Well-Being Act of 2022.”
